H0.text: Introduced in 1894 and one of the world's oldest trademarks, Bibendum is better known as what. Michelin Man

H1.text: Introduced in 1894 and one of the world's oldest trademarks, Bibendum is better known as what. Pirelli Mascot

H2.text: Introduced in 1894 and one of the world's oldest trademarks, Bibendum is better known as what. Goodyear Blimp

H3.text: Introduced in 1894 and one of the world's oldest trademarks, Bibendum is better known as what. Bibendum

A4.text: Bibendum (French pronunciation: [bibɛ̃dɔm]), commonly referred to in English as the Michelin Man or Michelin Tire Man, is the official mascot of the Michelin tire company.
